content.text: I'm doing well! I just finished a morning walk and I'm about to make breakfast.
Sounds good! I'm currently watching a documentary about spiders.
I hate spiders! They're so creepy.
Me too! I'm staying home this weekend to avoid them.
That's smart! I'm glad I have a flexible work schedule so I can go to dance lessons with my boyfriend and recycle more.
That's great! I'm in my last year of grad school, so I'm pretty busy with school and work.
Grad school is tough! Good luck with that!
Thanks! What are you doing for your retirement?
I plan to travel a lot and read all the books I never had time for.
That sounds like a great plan
